gramGrp.pos:
VB
with
OBJ
or
REFL VB

sense.def:
To restrain someone
pomeni preprečiti nekomu nekaj, kar je nameraval narediti.

seg.quote: She raised a finger as if to restrain Morris from speaking.
He had been unable to restrain himself from telling Gertrude.

sense.def:
To restrain something
pomeni doseči, da nekaj, kar raste ali se povečuje, ne postane preveliko.

seg.quote: ...the efforts of governments to restrain inflation.
